code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./Messages.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Messages=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchMessages=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:3000/api/messages");if(!response.ok)throw new Error("Failed to fetch messages");const data=await response.json();setMessages(data);}catch(err){console.error("Error:",err);}};fetchMessages();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"messages-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCE9 Messages"}),messages.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"no-messages",children:"No messages yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"messages-list",children:messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"message-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:msg.subject}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"From:"})," ",msg.name," (",msg.email,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:msg.message})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/"),className:"back-btn",children:"\uD83D\uDD19 Back to Contact"})]});};export default Messages;
